column1: '''''Shadows of Heaven: Religion and Fantasy in the Fiction of C.S. Lewis, Charles Williams and J.R.R. Tolkien''''' is an analysis of the works of [[C.S. Lewis]], [[Charles Williams]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

#Charles Williams: Fantasy and Ontology of Love
